item.description:

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-10
  • City: YPSILANTI
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DRIVER CALLS IN A LEAKING PACKAGE. DRIVER DID NOT TOUCH SECURED VEHICLE AND CALLED CENTER. REPONDER ARRIVES WITH FULL PPE AND DECISION TREE IN HAND. RESPONDS TO THE SPILL ACCORDING TO THE DT AND RESPONSE SHEET. SPILL CONTAINED AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE CENTER FOR PROCESSING.
